headline: The Vow
description: A personal vow of healing and self-love, paired with symbolic visual art of rebirth and growth. The post reflects on inner renewal after emotional collapse.

fieldDefinitions.timeFelt: Mid-July 2025, during a period of personal clarity and resolve
fieldDefinitions.whyItMatters: Documents a turning point of intentional healing, asserting the importance of internal restoration before seeking relational affirmation

motifMap.position: central metaphor in both text and imagery

motifMap.meaning: the remains of past pain and collapse
the fragile clarity of new beginnings

fieldDefinitions.articleExcerpt: I will not give up my trust and heart. But I will not seek another to love me until I love myself...
sourceFragments: Written by Aleksandr, drawing on personal emotional experience

associatedMedia.description: A minimalistic cover image depicting a phoenix rising from gray-white ash, with wings formed from petals and light. Muted tones convey solemnity and renewal.
